I want to prepare a STAR interview answer

During my internship, I worked on a project where we had to analyze water consumption data.
Initially, the data was very messy and there were missing values and anomalies.
I used Python and pandas to clean the data and then applied K-Means clustering.
At first, the results were not accurate, so I changed the feature engineering approach.
In the end, the model helped classify consumption patterns better and the company could detect abnormal usage.
I want to prepare a STAR interview answer

During my internship, I worked on a project where we had to analyze water consumption data.
Initially, the data was very messy and there were missing values and anomalies.
I used Python and pandas to clean the data and then applied K-Means clustering.
At first, the results were not accurate, so I changed the feature engineering approach.
In the end, the model helped classify consumption patterns better and the company could detect abnormal usage.

Python Intern | Dec 2023 – March 2024
 Built an automated WaterClassify algorithm to categorize real-time water consumption using K-Means
clustering and engineered statistical features.
 Conducted minute-level resampling, data cleaning, and anomaly handling, improving data integrity for ML
classification.
 Designed event-level features (duration, flow rate, volume), enabling accurate consumption pattern analysis.
 Produced category-wise summary analytics for stakeholders to track high-usage events and abnormal patterns.

PROJECTS
Travel Planner AI Agent
Major Project

step itineraries with external API suggestions, achieving a 90% user satisfaction rating based on user feedback.
 Impact: Delivers smart, user-friendly trip planning using AI agent workflows and prompt engineering.
 Click Here : GitHub Repo | Live Demo
End-to-End File QA Chatbot (RAG)
Major Project
 Technologies: Python, Streamlit, LangChain, Google Gemini 2.5 Flash, ChromaDB, PyMuPDF
 Features: Built a production-ready QA chatbot using Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG), allowing users
to upload PDFs and ask natural language questions with real-time source citations.
 Impact: Showcased deep understanding of LLMs, embeddings, vector search, and prompt engineering, solving
a real-world problem in document intelligence and knowledge management.
